DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_00: [UE:Meta key="98faa80483f24f628e3d80b947a8198d" Scale="1"/]Huh. You managed to beat your opponent!
DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_01: [UE:Meta key="c8b7b5cae2e844d9ae538baff4be059c" Scale="1"/]You won by at least [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Dori" scale="0.56"/]{Num}!
DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_02: [UE:Meta key="1d2881e777164cd8b30422de0ad943bc" Scale="1"/]You turned it around and pulled out the win!
DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_03: [UE:Meta key="b82aba803e5846ae912206a8f6d37cb0" Scale="1"/]You dominated by at least [PictureFont:IconData key="Icon_Dori" scale="0.56"/]{Num}!
DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_04: [UE:Meta key="225aa561945844729e153a22f3d0baaa" Scale="1"/]Your collecting habits helped you get the win!
DDBUI.DDB_MedalConditions_05: [UE:Meta key="e2429e53911e425e93b7c596104b064e" Scale="1"/]No Sneak Bomb could stop you this time!
DDBUI.CaveLVS000_Info:
[UE:Meta key="f03bfee821e5444e82050f38862a834e" Scale="1"/]With its compact size, this stage is perfect
for some quick and easy Dandori Battles.
Expect to go toe-to-toe with your opponent!
DDBUI.CaveLVS001_Info:
[UE:Meta key="ecbfe2b788554eb49d6d4bbea5d70dfa" Scale="1"/]Not too big and not too small. This stage is
just the right size and well-balanced for
all play styles.
DDBUI.CaveLVS002_Info:
[UE:Meta key="058728049fbf4928a6c119a538fdfdad" Scale="1"/]Do you storm the castle from above or below?
You'll need top-notch Dandori skills either way,
but it all starts with this one pivotal choice.
DDBUI.CaveLVS003_Info:
[UE:Meta key="46e9d71722b04876b2c1ba96390b4dee" Scale="1"/]An exciting battle in a wilderness oasis!
Stock up on those Gold Nuggets and
watch your points pile in.
DDBUI.CaveLVS004_Info:
[UE:Meta key="842478c52cc646c380aa2291da46f1c9" Scale="1"/]It's all about how you use your fire starters in
this stage. If you can't quite figure it out,
you can always use a creature instead.
DDBUI.CaveLVS005_Info:
[UE:Meta key="e47e2ce8438b49599727baee2f47f003" Scale="1"/]This is a spacious Dandori arena with plenty of
height differential. Use your Pikmin and pup
strategically if you want to be the winner.
DDBUI.DDB_AI001_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="5a144aecf78345b5850e0601eba71ee4" Scale="1"/]The more Pikmin you propagate, the more stuff
you can collect! Use this stage to brush up on
Dandori Battle basics.
DDBUI.DDB_AI002_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="a220eb92145f40a5a0255b7450e39846" Scale="1"/]Targeting Bonus Finds is the trick to becoming
a Dandori pro! But remember that frozen
creatures shatter on impact and can't be carried.
DDBUI.DDB_AI003_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="560e2119240f4b49af7dbeae149f2044" Scale="1"/]You can conquer the Dandori castle using
Mystery Capsules. And don't forget to take
advantage of those Golden Sniffers!
DDBUI.DDB_AI004_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="666facffb59241a997f825e766ab6555" Scale="1"/]Whoever gathers the most Gold Nuggets is the
true Dandori master. But with Sneak Bombs, you
won't know the true winner until the last second!
DDBUI.DDB_AI005_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="199a8979daf24e88802fae22229d4e09" Scale="1"/]This Dandori Battle is sure to get heated with
fire starters flying left and right! Use all the
Dandori skills you've acquired to win this one.
DDBUI.DDB_AI006_P_Info:
[UE:Meta key="2edea3f39df24cd7b0edcfbcc46801d3" Scale="1"/]Winged Pikmin, Glow Pikmin, and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] must all
work together in this stage. It's a fitting venue
for the culmination of all your Dandori training!
DDBUI.DDB_LocalUnlock: [UE:Meta key="25a8e51c94de4013b2655252aca52d38" Scale="1"/]New elements added to Dandori Battle.
DDBUI.DDB_LocalUnlock_Map: [UE:Meta key="be0f8f5665a34722a405bfb99498905b" Scale="1"/]More stages are now available.
DDBUI.DDB_LocalUnlock_Pikmin: [UE:Meta key="33ddda1797dd454da21f90282ed46dc9" Scale="1"/]New Pikmin types available in Battle Settings.
DDBUI.DDB_LocalUnlock_Model: [UE:Meta key="c11706e0178040a58f2d8b73585deb38" Scale="1"/]New characters added to Player Settings.
